options.name: EULA
options.desc: Whether you agree to Mojangs EULA. This option must be set to true to run Minecraft server.

options.name: Declarative
options.desc: Use declarative server configuration to alter serverProperties or the whitelist.

options.name: Firewall
options.desc: Open ports in the firewall for the server.

options.name: Maximum players
options.desc: Number of players who can join the server.

name: Openssh
desc: SSH tunnel for manual tweaking and access to your machine. Warning: If you break the Xnode-Admin service you will need to fix it yourself or factory reset to regain control from the Studio.

options.name: Password login
options.desc: Whether ssh can be accessed using a password.

options.name: Keyboard interactive login
options.desc: Whether ssh can be accessed using a keyboard interactive login.

name: Headscale
desc: Securely access services on your Xnode
